name: HDFC Bank Pixel Play Credit Card

network.note: Both Visa and RuPay variants are issued. RuPay is digital-only, Visa is physical card.

joining.waiverCondition: Spend ₹20,000 in first 90 days of card issuance

renewalWaiver.waiverText: Spend ₹1,00,000 or more in the preceding 12 months to get renewal fee waived

addOnCard.note: Add-on cards not available for this digital-first card

latePayment.note: Late payment charges exclude GST. W.e.f 1st Oct 2025

rentPayTransaction.note: 1% fee on rental transactions. W.e.f 1st Oct 2025

fuelTransactionFee.note: 1% fee on fuel transactions exceeding ₹15,000. W.e.f 1st Oct 2025

utilityFee.note: 1% fee on utility spends exceeding ₹50,000 per calendar month. W.e.f 1st Oct 2025

walletLoading.note: 1% fee on wallet loading (excl PayZapp) exceeding ₹10,000/month. W.e.f 1st Oct 2025

onlineGaming.note: 1% fee on online skill-based gaming spends exceeding ₹10,000/month. W.e.f 1st Oct 2025

educationThirdParty.note: 1% fee on education transactions via third-party apps (CRED, Nobroker, Cheq etc). Direct college/school payments exempt. W.e.f 1st Oct 2025

railwayTicket.note: 1% of transaction amount + GST on IRCTC transactions

paymentReturn.note: 2% of payment amount subject to minimum of ₹450

dccMarkup.note: 1% markup on transactions in INR at international locations or merchants registered overseas

existingRelationship.note: Also available as FD-backed secured card via PayZapp

creditLimit.factors: Based on income, credit score, and existing relationship. For FD-backed cards, up to 90% of FD value.
creditLimit.enhancementCriteria: Good repayment history and card usage

splitLimit.note: If already holding another HDFC Bank credit card, credit limit must be split during application

gracePeriod.note: 20 to 50 days interest-free period from date of purchase. Not applicable if previous balance not cleared in full or cash advance taken.

minPayment.calculation: 5% of (Finance Charges + Retail Spends + Cash Advance) or minimum ₹200, whichever is higher. MAD includes 100% of fees/charges, GST, and EMI amounts.

cashAdvance.note: 2.5% of amount withdrawn or ₹500, whichever is higher. Finance charges apply from date of withdrawal until full payment.

baseRate.note: 1% cashback on all eligible spends (unlimited, capped at ₹15,000/month)

rewards.earningText: Earn 1% to 5% CashPoints based on spend category

categories: Purchases converted to EMI post facto
Payment of card fees and other charges
exclusions.note: MCC 6540 is for prepaid/gift cards/wallet loads. These MCCs are excluded from all CashPoints earning.

fivePercentPacks.note: Combined cap of 500 CashPoints per month for selected 2 packs

smartBuy.note: 500 CashPoints cap per month on SmartBuy

threePercentEcommerce.note: 500 CashPoints cap per month on selected e-commerce platform

upiSpends.note: 500 CashPoints cap per month on RuPay UPI transactions

onePercentUnlimited.note: Maximum ₹15,000 cashback per calendar month under 1% unlimited category

insurance.note: CashPoints for insurance spends capped at 2,000 per day. W.e.f 1st Oct 2025

inactivityForfeiture.note: CashPoints nullified if card not used for more than 365 days

welcome.description: No welcome bonus. Joining fee waiver available on spending ₹20,000 in 90 days.

renewal.condition: Renewal fee waiver on spending ₹1 lakh in preceding year

threePercentEcommerce.note: 3% not applicable on RuPay UPI Scan & Pay and UPI Ecom transactions. Not applicable on Amazon Pay wallet load.

smartBuy.note: If PayZapp selected as 3% merchant, SmartBuy via PayZapp gets 5%. If Myntra/Nykaa/MakeMyTrip selected for 5%, those merchants on SmartBuy also get 5%.

upiSpends.note: Special MCCs 5960, 6300, 6529 have ₹2 lakh limit. First 24 hrs after linking: ₹5,000/day limit.

allOtherSpends.note: 1% unlimited cashback on all other eligible spends. Max ₹15,000 per calendar month.

fuel.note: No CashPoints on fuel transactions. 1% surcharge waiver available separately.

insurance.note: CashPoints capped at 2,000 per day for insurance transactions. W.e.f 1st Oct 2025. Online skill-based gaming earns 0 CashPoints.

walletLoads.note: No CashPoints on wallet loads, gift cards, prepaid cards, voucher purchases (MCC 6540)

government.note: No CashPoints on government related transactions

bankPortal.name: SmartBuy
bankPortal.note: 5% CashPoints on SmartBuy purchases. Cannot be clubbed with other 5%, 3%, 1% merchant cashbacks.

merchants.name: Uber
merchants.condition: Must select Travel pack. Only MCC 4121 & 7512 eligible.

merchants.name: Amazon
merchants.condition: Must select as 3% e-commerce merchant. Not applicable on Amazon Pay wallet load.

merchants.name: PayZapp
merchants.condition: Must select as 3% e-commerce merchant. Gets 5% on SmartBuy if selected.

redemption.bestOption: Redeem to PayZapp wallet at 1:1 ratio

options.note: 1 CashPoint = ₹1. Can be used for bill payments, recharges, and purchasing vouchers from 100+ brands.

transferPartners.note: No airline or hotel transfer partners. CashPoints can only be redeemed to PayZapp wallet.

pooling.note: No pooling available. Single card CashPoints only.

specialLogic.fractionalRounding: CashPoints rounded down to nearest integer. Fractional CashPoints not accrued.
specialLogic.reversalPolicy: If transaction returned/cancelled/reversed after calendar month completion, equivalent CashPoints will be reversed from balance.
specialLogic.emiConversion: CashPoints earned on transaction reversed if converted to EMI at later date.
specialLogic.negativeBalance: If negative CashPoints balance for 2 consecutive statement months, charged back at 1 CashPoint = ₹1.
specialLogic.combinedStatement: For customers with both Visa & RuPay variants, combined rewards of both variants posted together.

calculator.formula: cashPoints = floor(transactionAmount * rate / 100) where rate = 5% for selected packs, 3% for e-commerce, 1% for others

programs.name: Swiggy Dineout
programs.note: Save up to 25% on restaurant bills via Swiggy Dineout (inclusive of restaurant and Swiggy discounts) at 20,000+ restaurants

programs.name: Dineout Pay (Pixel Go specific)
programs.note: Up to 20% discount via Dineout Pay with max ₹300/month savings

fuel.note: 1% fuel surcharge waiver. GST on surcharge not reversed. Rate varies by fuel station and acquiring bank. No fuel surcharge waiver on UPI payments.

dynamicCurrencyConversion.recommendation: 1% markup on transactions in INR at international locations. Always pay in local currency.

forex.note: Currency conversion rate as on settlement date applicable. Capital account transactions outside India not permitted.

noCostEMI.note: Available at select merchants during checkout

interestRates.note: Check PayZapp app for current EMI interest rates

restrictions: Gold and Jewelry linked transactions not permitted for EMI conversion
emi.note: 100% digital EMI conversion via PayZapp. CashPoints accrued on transaction reversed when converted to EMI.

fraudLiability.reportingWindow: Zero liability after reporting loss. Cardholder liable for transactions before reporting.
fraudLiability.note: As per RBI Customer Protection guidelines

insurance.note: This is an entry-level card with limited insurance benefits. Zero Lost Card Liability as per RBI guidelines available.

contactless.note: Tap & Pay transactions up to ₹5,000 without PIN. PIN required above ₹5,000.

virtualCard.note: RuPay card issued as digital/virtual card. Visa card issued as physical card with ICE design as default.

upiLinking.note: RuPay credit card can be linked to UPI for Scan & Pay. 1% cashback on UPI spends (500 cap/month).

swipeToPay.note: Make e-commerce transactions without OTP verification via Swipe to Pay feature

tokenization.note: Card can be tokenized for secure online payments

upgradesFrom.note: PIXEL Play is the higher variant of PIXEL Go

upgradePathway.note: As an entry-level digital card, upgrade paths to premium HDFC cards may be available based on spend history

meta.bestFor: Young, digital-savvy users who want customizable cashback on preferred categories like dining, fashion, travel, and e-commerce with easy app-based management
meta.notRecommendedFor: Users seeking lounge access, travel insurance, premium perks, or airline/hotel transfer partners. Not ideal for high fuel or rent spenders.
meta.verdict: The HDFC Pixel Play is an excellent entry-level cashback card for digital natives. The customizable 5% cashback on preferred categories, 3% on chosen e-commerce platform, and 1% unlimited baseline provides good value. The all-digital experience via PayZapp, RuPay UPI integration, and low annual fee (easily waivable) make it attractive for young spenders. However, the caps of 500 points/month on accelerated categories limit earning potential, and it lacks premium benefits like lounge access, insurance, or transfer partners.
pros: Customizable 5% cashback on 2 of 5 category packs
1% unlimited cashback on other spends (up to ₹15,000/month)
RuPay variant enables UPI payments with 1% cashback
Low annual fee easily waivable with ₹1 lakh annual spend
Fully digital management via PayZapp app
Also available as FD-backed secured card
cons: Low caps of 500 CashPoints/month on accelerated categories
3.5% forex markup makes it poor for international use
Only redeemable to PayZapp wallet (limited redemption options)
Must split credit limit if holding another HDFC card
Multiple new fees introduced (rent, fuel, utility, gaming) w.e.f Oct 2025
